features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride fabric[600mm/2,000g]is highly breathable and quick drying
Low-bulk Thermolite®[180g body/140g sleeves]insulation uses 40% recycled materials to trap warm air and features a larger surface area to boost moisture evaporation
Welt-entry microfleece hand-warmer pockets and zippered interior chest pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
